title: Did NY Democrats Block a Bill Expanding Tuition Aid for Gold Star Families?
subtitle: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo, also a Democrat, bypassed the legislature to expand the Gold Star tuition program unilaterally.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Democrats in a committee of the New York Assembly voted to block a bill extending the state's tuition aid program covering Gold Star families to include children of service members killed or disabled while not in combat.
